summary: The New awaited dungeon is here!
descriptionHtml:
Shout out to AfroBear90 for giving me a sweet donation. Thank you! :)

The New awaited dungeon is here! This has taken serveral hours to complete and will come with updates in the future!

The entrance is on the way to high hrothgar! from ivarrstead!

THERE IS ENEMIES

There are 4 cells
The entrance
The Mine Shaft
Dwarrowdelf
Khazad Dum

There is also a few chests but not many as i didnt want it to be a loot fest but plenty of monsters to kill including a big troll! :)

In the future i will add more rooms to drarrowdelf and the 3 doors that gandalf is trying to decide what door to use will be entrances to other areas such as:
- A waterworks
- more chambers
- mine shafts

Dwarrodelf at the moment is smaller than it is compared to the movie. it will be bigger with futre updates.

For the Moment i am using the Dwarven Centurion as the Balrog he is Strong! so just FLYY! ;)

Also i was thinking of having a version where its populated, ill see ;)

IF ANYONE WANTS TO MAKE THIS INTO A QUEST THEN PLEASE INBOX ME ID HAPPILY ACCEPT AS I AM NOT VERY GOOD AT SCRIPTING
author: Tomolyons
